title: Notice of the 19th Annual General Meeting (AGM)
content: Welcome to the 19th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of our Association! This is a special event that brings together our members—whether near or far—to reconnect and rejuvenate the bond that ties us as a community. Your presence matters, whether you attend in person or join online.

title: Durga Puja Cultural Night
content:
• Dance Performance
  • Kids’ Skit & Drama
  • Live DJ and Food Stalls

title: Community Safety Workshop
content: Join us for an interactive workshop on neighborhood safety and first aid. Let's keep our community safe and informed.
